HSP_ACCOUNT_4.name: HSP_ACCOUNT_4
HSP_ACCOUNT_4.description: This table contains hospital account information from the Hospital Accounts Receivable (HAR) master file. It excludes Professional Billing HARs created by visit filing order in non-single billing office service areas. This fourth hospital account table has the same basic structure as HSP_ACCOUNT, HSP_ACCOUNT_2 and HSP_ACCOUNT_3.

columns.name: HSP_ACCOUNT_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the hospital account.

columns.name: TOT_INS_PMT
columns.description: The total amount of insurance payments posted to this account, not including refunds.

columns.name: TOT_INS_ADJ
columns.description: The total amount of insurance adjustments posted to this account, not including refunds.

columns.name: TOT_SP_PMT
columns.description: The total amount of self-pay payments posted to this account, not including refunds.

columns.name: TOT_AR_INS_PMT
columns.description: The total amount of active AR insurance payments posted to this account, not including refunds.

columns.name: TOT_AR_INS_ALLOWANCES
columns.description: The total amount of active AR insurance allowance adjustments posted to this account.

columns.name: TOT_AR_SP_PMT
columns.description: The total amount of active AR self-pay payments posted to this account, not including refunds.

columns.name: TOT_INS_PMTS_AND_RFNDS
columns.description: The total insurance payment amount posted to the account, less any refunded amount.

columns.name: TOT_SP_PMTS_AND_RFNDS
columns.description: The total self-pay payment amount posted to the account, less any refunded amount.

columns.name: TOT_PMTS_AND_RFNDS
columns.description: The total payment amount posted to the account, less any refunded amount.

columns.name: TOT_ADJ_EXCL_RFNDS
columns.description: The total adjustment amount posted to the account, not including refund adjustments.

columns.name: SP_RESP_AFTER_INS
columns.description: The balance transferred to self-pay after insurance is taken into account. This does not include any self-pay discount, financial assistance, or pre-payments.

columns.name: SP_RESP_LESS_DISCOUNT
columns.description: The self-pay responsibility after any self-pay or financial assistance discounts are posted on the self-pay bucket.

columns.name: BAL_IN_FULL_SELF_PAY_YN
columns.description: This column indicates whether the balances for this hospital account are entirely in self-pay. 'Y' indicates that all balances are in self-pay. 'N' or NULL indicates that there are some balances not in self-pay or the account has not been billed.

columns.name: FIRST_TX_POST_DATE
columns.description: This column is the original post date for the very first transaction that filed to this hospital account, even if that transaction has been reposted, transferred, or reversed.
